title: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai celebrates its 120th year
description: Puneet Chhatwal, managing director and chief executive officer of IHCL said founded by Jamsetji Tata in 1903 and nurtured by the 'visionary' leaders of the Tata Group, Taj, continues to be a 'legendary' symbol of timeless hospitality.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
